description.english: Complete the opening storyline and survive
description.schinese: 完成开幕剧情，并存活下来
description.tchinese: 完成開幕劇情，存活下來

description.english: Attract the attention of the Blood Ancestor for the first time

description.english: Defeat the Blood Ancestor when encountering him for the first time

description.tchinese: 第一次遇見血魔老祖時將其擊敗
